title: SOC Investigation — Impossible Travel (M365 + Wazuh)
description: Investigated risky sign-ins, correlated MFA failures and user agent anomalies; recommended Conditional Access & session revoke.

title: Incident Response — Suspicious PowerShell (LOLBins)
description: Decoded base64 payload, isolated host, removed persistence, restored from gold image; added ASR recommendations.

title: CTF — TryHackMe: Blue (EternalBlue)
description: Enumeration → exploit (EternalBlue) → post‑exploitation; notes on patch management and network segmentation.

title: Vulnerability Assessment — Linux Web Server
description: Outdated Apache & directory listing exposure; remediation with patches and config hardening.

title: GRC — M365 Risk Assessment (NIST/ISO/CIS)
description: Identity risks, external sharing, legacy auth; controls mapped to NIST AC‑1/AC‑2, ISO A.9, CIS IG1/IG2.

title: Scripting — PowerShell AD Audit + Python EVTX Parser
description: PowerShell export of account posture & Python 4625 parser to surface failed logins with IPs.

title: Cloud — Azure Risky Sign‑In Analysis
description: Detected TOR exit node sign‑ins, enforced block legacy auth and risk‑based MFA.
